CL_PRESENTATION_TITLE: This plugin will allow you to write logs visible by your users in the changelog, also called "modification log".
CL_LEVEL_ERROR: The field "Level of importance" is required.
CL_AUTHOR_ERROR: The field "Author" is required and must be between 2 and 50 characters long.
CL_COMMENT_ERROR: The field "Comment" is required and must be at least 10 characters long.
CL_ADD_SUCCESS: The changelog has been successfully published!
CL_ERROR_OCCURED: An error has occurred. Please try again!
